short_summary: conversion of two (2) M109 tanks into Commemorative Monuments with the option to convert an additional two (2) M109 tanks when required.
description: provision of labour, materials, tools, products, storage space, transportation and equipment necessary to transport the Military Vehicles from 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot at 6363 Rue Notre Dame, Montreal, Quebec, to the Contractor’s facility, convert them into Commemorative Monuments and deliver them back to 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot at 6363 Rue Notre Dame, Montreal, Quebec.
